name: There are NOHEROES in a world without brands

metadata.name: There are NOHEROES in a world without brands
metadata.description:
This is a historical moment when global brands are leaving Russian market, changing the normal lives of people. It shows how much people depend on other countries and how important uniting and communication between all people is for the common good. And I just tried to capture this moment. This is far from a complete list. Perhaps this collection will have an addition and short videos with each brand separately. Peace.

MP4 file 1150x1080px
Drawn and animated with Photoshop (105 layers)
Finalized in IMovie
15 seconds
Use Headphones for a better sound experience
